trans-unit.source: Provides a customizable activity designer surface for users to visually modify on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma superfície do designer de atividade personalizável aos utilizadores modificar visualmente numa superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The FreeformActivityDesigner allows users to modify how an activity appears on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O FreeformActivityDesigner permite aos utilizadores modificar como uma atividade é apresentada na superfície de desenho fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: When you associate FreeformActivityDesigner with a custom activity class using the `Designer` attribute, the custom activity's appearance is different from other activities when a user drops the custom activity onto a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando associa FreeformActivityDesigner uma classe de atividade personalizado utilizando a `Designer` atributo, aspeto a atividade personalizada é diferente de outras atividades quando um utilizador ignora a atividade personalizada para uma superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: Once FreeformActivityDesigner displays an activity on the design surface, users can draw connectors to other activity designers and resize the designer within the parameters defined by the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Depois de FreeformActivityDesigner mostra uma atividade na superfície do design, os utilizadores podem desenhar conectores para outros estruturadores de atividades e redimensionar o estruturador de parâmetros definidos pela superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Users can only add connectors to the custom activity because the FreeformActivityDesigner is associated with the top-level activity in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Os utilizadores só podem adicionar conectores para a atividade personalizada porque o FreeformActivityDesigner está associado a atividade num fluxo de trabalho de nível superior.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> que aplicações de acessibilidade utilizem para ajustar a IU da aplicação para utilizadores com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: If no `AccessibleObject` is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Se não `AccessibleObject` está atualmente atribuído ao controlo, é criada uma nova instância de um.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the `AccessibilityObject` property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Obter ou definir o `AccessibilityObject` propriedade, tem de adicionar uma referência à assemblagem acessibilidade instalada com o .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]objetos acessíveis, consulte a secção de acessibilidade do Active Directory da biblioteca MSDN.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> associada ao controlo.

trans-unit.source: Adds a connector to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um conector para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: AddConnector is called when a user adds a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: AddConnector será chamado sempre que um utilizador adiciona um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> localização para iniciar o desenho o conector.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> localização para concluir o conector de desenho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that was added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> que foi adicionado para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: source or target contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: sourceou target contém um referência ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The property for source or target contains a reference ().
trans-unit.target: The property for source or target contains a reference ().

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is not the container for the connector to add.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> não é o contentor para o conector adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is resized automatically when a user resizes the designer's child designers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> redimensionado automaticamente quando um utilizador redimensionar designers do estruturador subordinado.

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSize, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando configurar AutoSize, o esquema do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>é atualizado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is resized automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> é redimensionado automaticamente; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the margin size to render around the child designers when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho de margem para compor em torno os designers subordinados quando o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> é automaticamente redimensionada.

trans-unit.source: The default size of AutoSizeMargin is a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object with dimensions of 40 pixels by 40 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho predefinido de AutoSizeMargin é um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>objeto com dimensões de 40 pixels em 40 pixéis.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property associated with the current workflow theme is set to `true`, AutoSizeMargin settings are half the height and half the width of the grid size.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade associada o tema do fluxo de trabalho atual está definida como `true`, AutoSizeMargin definições são meio a altura e meio a largura do tamanho da grelha.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSizeMargin, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando configurar AutoSizeMargin, o esquema do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>é atualizado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the margin to render around the child designers of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho da margem para compor em torno os designers subordinado do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> definições para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of AutoSizeMode allows the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to grow as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Permite que o comportamento predefinido de AutoSizeMode de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>aumente conforme necessário para que se adeque ao seu conteúdo, mas não reduzir menor que o valor da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When you set AutoSizeMode, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando configurar AutoSizeMode, o esquema do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>é atualizado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default setting is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Brings the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the top of the z-order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Traz especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> na parte superior da ordem z do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: BringToFront modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as its top visible child designer.
trans-unit.target: BringToFront modifica a ordem z para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>para apresentar especificado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>como o estruturador subordinado visível superior.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the top of the z-order when a user selects it.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para apresentar um designer na parte superior a ordem z quando um utilizador seleccioná-lo.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call BringToFront.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`tem de ser um elemento subordinado do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>antes de chamar BringToFront.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, BringToFront throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Se não for, BringToFront emite um <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to bring to the top of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> para colocar na parte superior da ordem z.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignercontém um referência ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerNão foi encontrado no coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can create a connection between the specified connection point on a source child activity designer and the specified connection point on a target child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> pode criar uma ligação entre o ponto de ligação especificada de um designer de atividade de subordinados de origem e o ponto de ligação especificada num designer de atividade de subordinados de destino.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the source activity designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> para verificar o designer de atividade de origem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the target activity designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> para verificar o designer de atividade de destino.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can draw a connector between source and target activity designers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> pode desenhar um conector entre a origem e destino os estruturadores de atividades; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be collapsed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> pode ser fechado numa superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: CanExpandCollapse always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: CanExpandCollapse sempre devolve `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be collapsed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> pode ser fechado; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a user can visually resize the specified child activity designer in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se um utilizador visualmente pode redimensionar o designer de atividade subordinado especificado no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, CanResizeContainedDesigner returns `true` if `containedDesigner` is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída numa classe derivada, CanResizeContainedDesigner devolve `true` se `containedDesigner` é <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Other types of designers cannot be resized.
trans-unit.target: Outros tipos de designers não podem ser redimensionados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> para verificar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user can visually resize the specified activity designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um utilizador visualmente pode redimensionar o designer de atividade especificado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> is added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> é adicionado ao <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorAdded event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A>é o processador de eventos de delegado registado para o evento ConnectorAdded.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user changes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> locations associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um utilizador altera a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> localizações associadas a um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> apresentado pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: Um conector é alterado quando um utilizador altera a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>localizações em cada extremidade de uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>objeto.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorChanged event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A>é o processador de eventos de delegado registado para o evento ConnectorChanged.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user removes a connector from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um utilizador remove um conector a partir do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the ConnectorRemoved event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>é o processador de eventos de delegado registado para o evento ConnectorRemoved.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of connectors that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção só de leitura de conectores que estão associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.
trans-unit.target: Um conector é a linha que aparece numa superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho que liga um designer de atividade para outra.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection that contains all <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de só de leitura que contém todos os <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> objetos associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a connector between the two specified connection points.
trans-unit.target: Cria um conector entre os dois pontos de ligação especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> localização para iniciar o desenho o conector.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> localização para concluir o conector de desenho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that was created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> que foi criado.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer is being disposed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the designer is being finalized.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estruturador está a ser eliminado; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se está a ser finalizado o estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os utilizadores podem arraste e desenhar conectores na superfície do designer de atividade de forma gratuita.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os utilizadores podem arraste e desenhar conectores na superfície do designer de atividade de forma livre; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be visually resized on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> podem ser redimensionados visualmente na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode>, EnableVisualResizing returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>está definido como `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode>, EnableVisualResizing devolve `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: In all other conditions EnableVisualResizing returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Todas as outras condições EnableVisualResizing devolve `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be visually resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> pode ser redimensionado; caso contrário, visualmente <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto selecionável primeira na ordem de navegação do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: FirstSelectableObject returns the first child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection, or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the collection count is zero.
trans-unit.target: FirstSelectableObject devolve o primeiro estruturador subordinado no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>coleção, ou um `null` referência (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) se a contagem de coleção é zero.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto selecionável primeira na ordem de navegação do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o objeto selecionável primeiro que se segue o objeto especificado na ordem de navegação de atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Object> in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref:System.Object>na ordem de navegação.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref> valor de enumeração que determina a ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro selecionável que segue o obj parâmetro na ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de glifos que são apresentados no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Glyphs returns a glyph for each connectable child designer found on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Glyphs devolve um glifo para cada estruturador subordinado conectável encontrado no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"> </xref> que contém os glifos apresentados no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""></xref> at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Devolve informações sobre o <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""> </xref> nas coordenadas especificadas na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: HitTest checks whether the location has occurred on a connector or one of the child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: HitTest verifica se a localização tenha ocorrido um conector ou um dos estruturadores de atividades subordinadas.

trans-unit.source: If the HitTest occurs on a child activity that is being dragged to another location, HitTest returns information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, not the designer being moved.
trans-unit.target: Se ocorrer o HitTest numa atividade subordinada que está a ser arrastada para outra localização, HitTest devolve informações sobre o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, não o estruturador a ser movido.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que contém as coordenadas na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho do qual pretende recolher informações.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified coordinates
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> nas coordenadas especificadas

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `Initialize` adds a designer property extender to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> for it to use until the design surface is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: `Initialize`Adiciona uma extensão de propriedade de designer para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>-lo utilizar até a superfície do design é destruída.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> com a qual ao inicializar o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified read-only collection of activities to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a coleção especificada só de leitura de atividades para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> na localização especificada na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que especifica a localização para adicionar as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> só de leitura coleção que contém as atividades para adicionar o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável ordem de navegação do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: LastSelectableObject returns the last child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> does not contain any child designers.
trans-unit.target: LastSelectableObject devolve o último estruturador subordinado no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>propriedade ou um `null` referência (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>não contém qualquer designers subordinados.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que é o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do estruturador.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a localização do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: When Location is set due to a user resizing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, the designer maintains the relative positions of its child designers.
trans-unit.target: Quando a localização é definida devido a um utilizador redimensionar a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, o estruturador mantém as posições relativas dos respetivos designers subordinados.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""></xref> that represents the location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""> </xref> que representa a localização do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as definições de tamanho mínimo para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the smallest possible size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho menor possíveis para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Moves activities to a specified location within the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Move atividades para uma localização especificada na superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: Location to move activities to.
trans-unit.target: Localização para mover das atividades.

trans-unit.source: Collection that contains the activities to move to `moveLocation.`
trans-unit.target: Coleção que contém as atividades para mover para`moveLocation.`

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Move o especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> para a localização especificada.

trans-unit.source: MoveContainedDesigner sets new bounds for the moved designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: MoveContainedDesigner define novos limites para o estruturador movido e efetua todas as operações de esquema necessário para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call MoveContainedDesigner.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`tem de ser um elemento subordinado do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>antes de chamar MoveContainedDesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, MoveContainedDesigner throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Se não for, MoveContainedDesigner emite um <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to move.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> mover.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the designer's new location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa a localização do estruturador de novo.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignercontém um referência ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerNão foi encontrado no coleção.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: Um conector é alterado quando um utilizador altera a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>localizações em cada extremidade de uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>objeto.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a child activity is added or deleted from its <xref uid="langword_csharp_Activities" name="Activities" href=""></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando uma atividade subordinada é adicionada ou eliminada do respetivo <xref uid="langword_csharp_Activities" name="Activities" href=""> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the added or removed activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre as atividades de adicionado ou removidas.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a connection has been established between two of its contained activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando tiver sido estabelecida uma ligação entre dois dos seus estruturadores de atividades incluídas.

trans-unit.source: OnContainedDesignersConnected is called when a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> is drawn between the source on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> object's contained activity designers to target on a second contained activity designer.
trans-unit.target: OnContainedDesignersConnected é chamado quando um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>é desenhado entre a origem de um do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>objeto do contido estruturadores de atividades para um segundo designer de atividade contidos de destino.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> localização para iniciar o desenho o conector.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> localização para concluir o conector de desenho.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is completed within the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando uma operação de arrastar largar é concluída dentro dos limites da respetiva superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que define os argumentos de eventos da operação.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando está em curso uma operação de arrastar largar e cursor do rato do utilizador está dentro dos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que define os argumentos de eventos da operação.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed when the designer has the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma tecla é premida quando o estruturador tem o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de esquema para a posição ajudas visuais e designers subordinado no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que define os argumentos de eventos da operação.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando o tamanho dos ajudas visuais nos designers apresentado pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: OnLayoutSize returns the size of the current bounding rectangle for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> when <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: OnLayoutSize devolve o tamanho do retângulo delimitador atual para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>Quando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>está definido como `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize calculates and returns new size settings for the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>está definido como `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize calcula e devolve novas definições de tamanho para o retângulo delimitador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to true and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnLayoutSize returns <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>está definido como true e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>não está definido, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>OnLayoutSize devolve <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que define os argumentos de eventos da operação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new size of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o novo tamanho do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a user is visually resizing it at design time.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando um utilizador é visualmente redimensionamento-la no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing performs all resizing tasks on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>está definido como `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing efetua todas as tarefas de redimensionamento a superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing performs layout tasks, but no resizing tasks.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>está definido como `true` e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, OnResizing executa tarefas de esquema, mas não existem tarefas de redimensionamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`, all contained designers retain their previous locations on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>está definido como `false`, todos os contidos designers manter localizações anteriores, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"> </xref> que define os argumentos de eventos da operação.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> that its associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> que o tema associado foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, OnThemeChange always sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> property to an empty string and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> property to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída numa classe derivada, OnThemeChange sempre define o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A>propriedade como uma cadeia vazia e o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A>propriedade `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A> is set to `true`, the locations of each child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is snapped to the nearest grid line.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A>está definido como `true`, as localizações de cada estruturador subordinado no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>é ajustado para a linha de grelha mais próximo.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that contains the updated theme property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> que contém as definições de propriedade de tema atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove o especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: RemoveConnector deletes the specified connector from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A> collection and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: RemoveConnector elimina o conector especificado a partir do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A>coleção e chamadas a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>método.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: connector contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: connectorcontém um referência ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Resizes the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the dimensions of specified size.
trans-unit.target: Redimensiona especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> para as dimensões de tamanho especificado.

trans-unit.source: ResizeContainedDesigner sets new bounds for the resized designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: ResizeContainedDesigner define novos limites para o estruturador redimensionado e efetua todas as operações de esquema necessário para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call ResizeContainedDesigner.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`tem de ser um elemento subordinado do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>antes de chamar ResizeContainedDesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, ResizeContainedDesigner throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Se não for, ResizeContainedDesigner emite um <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to resize.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> para redimensionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new dimensions of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa as novo dimensões do designer.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignercontém um referência ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerNão foi encontrado no coleção.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the bottom of the z-order of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define o especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> para o fim da ordem z do <xref uid="langword_csharp_FreeformActivityDesigner" name="FreeformActivityDesigner" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: SendToBack modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as the bottom visible designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: SendToBack modifica a ordem z para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>para apresentar especificado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>como o estruturador visível na parte inferior na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the bottom of the z-order when a user deselects it.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para apresentar um designer na parte inferior a ordem z quando um utilizador deselects-lo.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call SendToBack.
trans-unit.target: `containedDesigner`tem de ser um elemento subordinado do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>antes de chamar SendToBack.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If it is not, SendToBack throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Se não for, SendToBack emite um <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to set to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> definir para trás a ordem z.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignercontém um referência ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerNão foi encontrado no coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> desenha conectores em primeiro plano da respetiva superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a class that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, ShowConnectorsInForeground always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída numa classe que derive <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, ShowConnectorsInForeground sempre devolve `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref> desenha conectores em primeiro plano da respetiva estrutura superfície; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
